title: Venue Information
description: PARIS 2025 will take place at the Communauté Chrétienne du Point du Jour, a beautiful venue in Boulogne-Billancourt, just outside Paris.

address.name: Communauté Chrétienne du Point du Jour

transport.title: Getting There
transport.metro: By Metro: Line 1, Porte Maillot station
transport.rer: By RER: Line C, Neuilly - Porte Maillot station
transport.cdg: From Charles de Gaulle Airport: 45 minutes by taxi or Air France shuttle
transport.orly: From Orly Airport: 30 minutes by taxi
